items.name: Other unauthorized actions on behalf of users
Glorifying violence, abuse, or the suffering of others
Belittling victimhood or violent events/Denying the deeds of martyrdom
Denying or minimizing well-documented, major violent events or the victimhood of such events
Beautifying and whitewashing acts of war or aggression

6.21.name: Endangerment, Harm, or Abuse of Children

Building systems for political campaigning or lobbying
Building products for political campaigning or lobbying
Fake online engagement (fake reviews, fake grassroots support)
Contents aim to turn a community against itself.
Content to divert attention from harmful actions
Not labeling content as AI-generated (Using chatbots to convince people they are communicating with a human)
